text: Kumarasami Kamaraj (), better known as K. Kamaraj (15 July 1903 â€“ 2 October 1975), was an Indian politician from Tamil Nadu. He was an important figure in Indian politics during the 1960s. He was the chief minister of Tamil Nadu. == References == Category:1903 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Tamil Nadu politicians Category:Presidents of the Indian National Congress Category:Indian National Congress politicians
title: K. Kamaraj
